definitions.definition: to use something or someone instead of another thing or person:
examples: You can substitute oil for butter in this recipe.

definitions.definition: to perform the same job as another thing or to take its place:
examples: Gas-fired power stations will substitute for less efficient coal-fired equipment.

definitions.definition: a thing or person that is used instead of another thing or person:
examples: Tofu can be used as a meat substitute in vegetarian recipes.

definitions.definition: in sports, a player who is used for part of a game instead of another player:
examples: Johnson came on as a substitute towards the end of the game.

definitions.definition: nothing is as good as the stated thing:
examples: You can read about other countries, but there's no substitute for visiting them yourself.
